messages.subject: no more metadiscussions
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/14/02 7:45:26 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/14/02 7:45:26 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Thank you , thank you, thank you for the definition of metadiscussion
(this
is a new concept to me and I love it). Adopting the ban on metadiscussions
as
described in your post would be very good for the list. You have my vote. >>


Joyce did this several months ago.....suggested it anyway. She didn't want to
be an enforcer of some rule, but she gave us the guidelines to help us keep
the list focused.
It works fine, but inevitably some newbie will not understand this and slam
Sandra's (or someone elses) posting style. It's going to happen some I
suppose. But that's why you'll see most of the long timers here asking
everyone to please focus on unschooling.

Ren
